install.name: jtouch25
install.author: Nguyen @ MobileMeWs.com
install.description:
Jtouch25 - version 2.5.12 stable

A mobile and touch friendly template for Joomla 2.5, VirtueMart 2, and Kunena 1.7-2.0. Built on top of jQueryMobile 1.1

Home page | Download latest releases | Support forum

Love to use Jtouch? Please donate or vote for us!

field.name: jtouch-theme
field.label: Page Theme
field.description: Select theme apply to the whole page

field.name: jtouch-header-theme
field.label: Header Theme
field.description: Select theme apply to the header bar

field.name: jtouch-header-button-view
field.label: Header Button
field.description: Customize the layout of Header buttons. Default is Text + Image

field.name: jtouch-footer-theme
field.label: Footer Theme
field.description: Select theme apply to the footer bar

field.name: jtouch-always-show-back
field.label: Show Back Button
field.description: Always show back button on the left hand of header bar. Default is No

field.name: jtouch-fixed-header
field.label: Fixed Header
field.description: Fixed position of header bar while scrolling. Default is No

field.name: jtouch-fixed-footer
field.label: Fixed Footer
field.description: Fixed position of footer bar while scrolling. Default is No

field.name: jtouch-page-transition
field.label: Page Transition
field.description: Transition effects that can be applied to any page link or ajax form submission. Default is Fade

field.name: jtouch-banner
field.label: Main Banner
field.description: Path to image display on top of the page. Use as the main banner or logo for your mobile website. Enter -1 to turn banner OFF

field.name: jtouch-desktop-template
field.label: Desktop Template ID
field.description: User can switch to the desktop version of your website by change its template. Put the ID of this desktop template here. -1 for turn off this function. Default is -1

field.name: space-view-mobile
field.label: View site in mobile version

field.name: jtouch-ios-add-app
field.label: Add to Home Screen
field.description: Display Add to Home Screen dialog when users visit the mobile site on a iOS device. Default is Yes

field.name: jtouch-ios-icons
field.label: Icons Folder
field.description: Folder name (within jtouch25 template) has images which are using to create WebClip icon. Default is icons

field.name: jtouch-turnoff-ids
field.label: Turn Off Pages
field.description: If you don't want to load components from home page or any other pages, please specify their Menu Item IDs here, separates by commas, for example: 1,3,5. Default is -1

field.name: jtouch-debug
field.label: Debug
field.description: Select On to use uncompressed css and js files, useful for developer. Default is Off

field.name: jtouch-jquery-load
field.label: Use Default jQuery
field.description: Use the jQuery javascript provided by the Jtouch template or not. Default is Yes

field.name: jtouch-jqm-css
field.label: JQM CSS
field.description: Full: Includes all required css. Structure: Use incase you have a full custom swatches from A to E. Default is Full

field.name: jtouch-show-powerby
field.label: Show Powered By
field.description: Display MobileMeWs.com link at the bottom of your website. Help us spread the world, please :). Default is Yes

field.name: space-module-mapping-desc
field.label: Enter position alias to map your desktop modules to mobile. For example: if you want to display modules placed on 'left' position of your desktop template to 'jtouch-user1' position of Jtouch25, enter 'left' to 'jtouch-user1' field

field.name: jtouch-google-captcha-enable
field.label: Use ReCaptcha
field.description: If your website is turn on catpcha plugin and using Google ReCaptcha, please turn on this option. Default is No

field.name: jtouch-google-captcha-publickey
field.label: ReCaptcha Public Key
field.description: Your ReCaptcha Public Key. Must be the same what you have input to ReCaptcha Plugin

field.name: jtouch-google-analytics
field.label: Use Google Analytics
field.description: Add Google Analytics js to your website or not. If select Yes, please input your GA Account and domain main. Default is No

field.name: jtouch-google-account
field.label: GA Account
field.description: Your Google Analytics Code

field.name: jtouch-google-domain
field.label: GA Account
field.description: Your domain

field.name: jtouch-google-adsence
field.label: Enable Google Adsence
field.description: Select position to display Google Adsence. Deault is No

field.name: jtouch-google-adsence-type
field.label: Script Type
field.description: You can select between using PHP code or Native javascript. Deault is NATIVE

field.name: jtouch-google-adsence-client
field.label: Client ID
field.description: Your Google Adsence Client ID. For example: ca-pub-1140773070490156

field.name: jtouch-google-adsence-slot
field.label: Slot Name
field.description: Your Google Adsence Slot Name. For example: 7226972107

field.name: jtouch-google-adsence-width
field.label: Banner Width (px)
field.description: Width - in pixel - of Google Adsence banenr. Default is 320

field.name: jtouch-google-adsence-height
field.label: Banner Height (px)
field.description: Height - in pixel - of Google Adsence banenr. Default is 50

field.name: jtouch-virtuemart-load
field.label: Use VirtueMart2
field.description: Load stuffs for VirtueMart 2 or not. Select Yes if your website is running with VM. Default is No

field.name: jtouch-virtuemart-btn-level1
field.label: Button on 1st Page
field.description: Show 'Add to Cart' button on list of products page. Default is No

field.name: jtouch-kunena-load
field.label: Use Kunena
field.description: Load stuffs for Kunena 1.7 or not. Select Yes if your website is running with Kunena forum. Default is No
